validation.description: An array of custom validation actions to perform on selected elements of a BOM document.

actions.description: Validate custom disclaimer BOM metadata property.

properties.name: urn:example.com:disclaimer
properties.value: This SBOM is current as of the date it was generated and is subject to change\.

properties.name: urn:example.com:classification
properties.value: This SBOM is Confidential Information. Do not distribute\.
